name: CS11 Student Work
body: # Welcome to your first GitHub repository This is how you will be submitting work for this class, and (hopefully) for AP Computer Science next year. GitHub is a system for _version control_, kind of like Google Drive for code. You will be manually adding files this year, but in the future, you will be using Advanced Coding StuffTM to add your work. You should have a GitHub account that looks like FirstnameLastname or firstname-lastname. This is so that I can identify you work. Please DO NOT have a username like emojiPanda3000, because I won't know that it's you.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
